name: io.github.mgwellpay/thruai
description: The meta-infrastructure MCP server for AI agents. One API key for voice agents, phone calls, workflows, knowledge base, campaigns, self-learning, and webhooks. Replaces Twilio + Deepgram + ElevenLabs + OpenAI with a single credential.

environmentVariables.description: Your ThruAI API key (get one at https://thru.ai)
environmentVariables.name: THRUAI_API_KEY

environmentVariables.description: ThruAI API base URL (defaults to https://api.thru.ai)
environmentVariables.name: THRUAI_BASE_URL
